form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: NOTICE OF ENTRY OF APPEARANCE AS ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE, G-28

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/13/2023 NOTICE OF ENTRY OF APPEARANCE AS ATTORNEY OR R In re: DATE 2-8-91 ZEPEDA, Cesar FILE I hereby enter my appearance as attor for (or representative of), and at the request of, the following named person(s): NAME Petitioner Applicant ZEPEDA, Cesar 0. Beneficiary ADDRESS (Ap:. No.) (Number & Street) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 1033 Texel Lane Clarkston Ga 30021 NAME Petitioner Applicant Beneficiary ZEPEDA, Maria Teresa ADDRESS (Apt. No.) (Number & Street) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) Colonia Universitaria Norte Calle julio Mejia # 40 San Salvador El Salvador Check Applicable Item(s) below: 1 I am an attorney and o member in good standing of the bar of the Supreme Court of the United States or of the highest court of the following State, territory, insular possession, or District of Columbio GEORGIA SUPREME COURT and am not under o (Name of Court) court or administrative agency order suspending, enjoining, restraining, disbarring, or otherwise restricting me in practicing law. 2. I am on accredited representative of the following named religious, charitable, social service, or similar organization established in the United States and which is so recognized by the Board: 3. I am associated with 5 the attorney of record who previously filed o notice of appearance in this case and my appearance is at his request. (If you check this item, also check item 1 OT 2 whichever is appropriate.) 4. Others (Explain fully.) SIGNATURE COMPLETE ADDRESS 1375 Peachtree Street NE Suite 180 Atlanta, GA 30309 NAME (Type or Print TELEPHONE NUMBER George Handelsman 404-522-0777 PURSUANT TO THE PRIVACY ACT OF 1974, I HEREBY CONSENT TO THE DISCLOSURE TO THE FOLLOWING NAMED ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE OF ANY RECORD PERTAINING TO ME WHICH APPEARS IN ANY IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE SYSTEM OF RECORDS S. George Handelsman (Name of Attomey or Representative) THE ABOVE CONSENT TO DISCLOSE IS IN CONNECTION WITH THE FOLLOWING MATTER NAME OF PERSON CONSENTING SIGNATURE OF PERSON CONSENTING DATE Cesar Zepeda Eolepede 2-18-91 ( NOTE: Execution of this bor is required under the Privacy Act of 1974 where the person being impresented 18 a citizen of the United States or an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence.) Form G-28 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE (OVER) v.10-25-79)N Immigration and Naturalization Service For sale by the Superintendent of Documents U.S. Government Printing Office Washing' 2041.
